Package com.eiei.mycookerynotes.frames

Class SearchPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eiei.mycookerynotes.frames.content.SearchPanel
  • public class SearchPanel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for setting up ContentPanel with search elements

      • addDummies

        private static void addDummies()
        creates the dummy components on the left, right and the bottom of the frame to keep all the components in the center

      • addTextToMatchPane

        private static void addTextToMatchPane​(javax.swing.JTextPane pane,
                                       java.lang.String text,
                                       java.lang.String option)
        Adds text to JTextPanes created in showTitleResults(String) and showIngredientsResults(String)
        Parameters:
        pane - a JTextPane to which text should be added
        text - a text that should be added
        option - a "marker' of how the text should be added ("title" to add title with a style of StylesForTextPanes.setBigHeader(StyledDocument), "description" as a description with a style of StylesForTextPanes.setSmallItalic(StyledDocument)

      • clearSearch

        private static void clearSearch()
        Clears the search results

      • createTextPane

        private static javax.swing.JTextPane createTextPane​(Dish matchDish)
        Creates text pane with search results. Adds them MouseListener to make click action of mouse show the found dish
        Parameters:
        matchDish -
        Returns:

      • renewPanel

        private static void renewPanel​(javax.swing.JPanel panel)
        Revalidates and repaints a given panel
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel to be revalidated and repainted

      • showIngredientsResults

        private static boolean showIngredientsResults​(java.lang.String query)
        Shows the results for a query in receipts of a dishes as a JTextPane. Adds the text to the pane with the help of addTextToMatchPane(JTextPane, String, String) method.
        Parameters:
        query - an ingredient to be found in dishes' receipts
        Returns:
        true if match found, false if not

      • showResults

        private static void showResults​(java.lang.String query)
        This is general method that is calling search methods according to the selected by user
        Parameters:
        query - a char sequence that needs to be found

      • showSearchOnContentPanel

        public static void showSearchOnContentPanel()
        Fills the ContentPanel with the Search elements

      • showTitleResults

        private static boolean showTitleResults​(java.lang.String query)
        Shows the results for a query in titles of the dishes as a JTextPane. Adds the text to the pane with the help of addTextToMatchPane(JTextPane, String, String) method.
        Parameters:
        query - a char sequence that needs to be found in dishes' titles
        Returns:
        true if match found, false if not
